strings.Value: "What are you talking about, you madman?"
"What, "will of Lamashtu"? So she is behind the seeds and the monsters?!"
"Don't you dare die right now, you filth!"

{n}As you approach, the shaman bursts into bizarre squawking. After a moment it becomes clear to you: the goblin, choking on his own blood, has broken into gloating laughter.{/n}
"The {mf|baron|baroness} be too late! The will of {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} came true! The Bloom be happening!"

{n}The shaman's eyes, red, small and wicked, have a feverish glint to them.{/n} "And who else?! The blossom-seeds came down the stream. We drink – boom! boom! Longshanks drink — boom! boom! boom! Flowers grow, greatbeasts crawl out, {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu{/g} be pleased! I knew straight away what goblins do-must! Go up stream, seek Greatmother!"

{n}The shaman convulsively sucks some air in and carries on with a weakening voice.{/n} "Find! {g|Lamashtu}Lamashtu's{/g} Womb, up the river! Home of greatbeasts, seed-breedery! Leave guards so no one come in, and go back, back — make the longshanks gulp! Taint more, more! Sow man-death! All seeds be planted, all... make it... before..." {n}The light in the shaman's eyes is growing dim.{/n}
